summary: After being chosen to represent France in an international congress, Cruchot and his troops must go to New York, and adapt to its social and cultural aspects.

keywords: times square manhattan new york city|statue of liberty new york city|provence|new york city|manhattan new york city
title: El gendarme en Nueva York
